data.title: March Music Madness: Best Albums of 1994
data.meta_description: We’ve identified 64 of the best albums of 1994 to go head-to-head to determine the top record of the year. Vote for your favorite albums now!
data.text:
The Current’s March Music Madness is here. This year, we’re celebrating the 30th anniversary of the amazing albums released in 1994.

We’ve identified 64 of the best albums of 1994 to go head-to-head to determine the top record of the year. Between Monday, March 18, and Thursday, March 21, we’re playing songs on-air as part of each daily matchup.

Every day, from 8 a.m. to noon and 1 p.m. to 5 p.m., we’ll open a new matchup for voting every half hour. At the end of the day on Thursday, we’ll announce the top album of 1994, as voted by The Current’s listeners.

To download the March Music Madness bracket below, login to your user profile with The Current.

DOWNLOAD:

Share a photo of your paper bracket predictions using the #MarchMusicMadness hashtag. And enter for a chance to win a Summer at Surly prize pack featuring tickets to Pixies, Modest Mouse, and Cat Power; Black Pumas; Andrew Bird and Nickel Creek; and Mt. Joy.

March Music Madness 2024

Thursday, March 21

Round 3 (Thursday, March 21) 8 a.m.-noon

Matchup 49: Green Day - Dookie (51%) over Stone Temple Pilots - Purple (49%)

Matchup 50: Nirvana - MTV Unplugged in New York (69%) over Dave Matthews Band - Under the Table and Dreaming (31%)

Matchup 51: Oasis - Definitely Maybe (51%) over The Offspring - Smash (49%)

Matchup 52: R.E.M. - Monster (52%) over Beck - Mellow Gold (48%)

Matchup 53: Weezer - Weezer (Blue Album) (52%) over Liz Phair - Whip-Smart (48%)

Matchup 54: Pearl Jam - Vitalogy (51%) over Soundgarden - Superunknown (49%)

Matchup 55: Beastie Boys - Ill Communication (75%) over Ween - Chocolate and Cheese (25%)

Matchup 56: The Cranberries - No Need to Argue (51%) over Nine Inch Nails - The Downward Spiral (49%)

Round 4 (Thursday, March 21) 1 p.m.-3 p.m.

Matchup 57: Green Day - Dookie (51%) over Nirvana - MTV Unplugged in New York (49%)

Matchup 58: Oasis - Definitely Maybe (51%) over R.E.M. - Monster (49%)

Matchup 59: Weezer - Weezer (Blue Album) (51%) over Pearl Jam - Vitalogy (49%)

Matchup 60: Beastie Boys - Ill Communication (51%) vs. The Cranberries - No Need to Argue (49%)

Final Four (Thursday, March 21) 3 p.m.-4 p.m.

Matchup 61: Green Day - Dookie (52%) over Oasis - Definitely Maybe (48%)

Matchup 62: Weezer - Weezer (Blue Album) (51%) over Beastie Boys - Ill Communication (49%)

3rd Place (Thursday, March 21) 4 p.m.

Matchup 63 (3rd Place): Beastie Boys - Ill Communication (69%) over Oasis - Definitely Maybe (31%)

Final (Thursday, March 21) 4:30 p.m.

Matchup 64 (Championship): Green Day - Dookie (51%) over Weezer - Weezer (Blue Album)
